last_episode_to_air.name: LAUREL (Symb. glory)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The members of the de la Mora family each celebrate their new beginning while, in the shadows, Purificación plots her revenge.

name: The House of Flowers
overview: The outward perfection of a family-run flower business hides a dark side rife with dysfunctional secrets in this darkly humorous comedy series.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The de la Mora family grieves a loss while trying to recover sold businesses, plotting revenge and entangling themselves in romantic disasters.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The struggling de la Mora family faces new challenges with a new matriarch, while flashbacks reveal secrets about Virginia's youthful antics.

episodes.name: NARCISSUS (symb. lies)
episodes.overview: The de la Mora family celebrates patriarch Ernesto's birthday with a giant party, but his mistress has darker plans for his big day.

episodes.name: CHRYSANTHEMUM (symb. pain)
episodes.overview: Virginia reads Roberta's letter. Paulina struggles to hide the funeral from her mother and siblings. Ernesto breaks the news to young daughter Micaela.

episodes.name: LILY (symb. freedom)
episodes.overview: Roberta's actions inspire Julián to share his own news, but mother Virginia is not prepared to listen to what he has to say -- nor is girlfriend Lucía.

episodes.name: PETUNIA (symb. resentment)
episodes.overview: Delia reveals a new family secret to Elena. Chance encounters give Virginia and her son creative ideas on how to solve the family's financial troubles.

episodes.name: DAHLIA (symb. gratitude)
episodes.overview: Elena seeks Claudio's help with a tricky floral order for a VIP client's bar mitzvah, but Paulina sabotages their efforts. The DNA results arrive.

episodes.name: MAGNOLIA (symb. dignity)
episodes.overview: Paulina sees her ex for the first time in years. Tensions arise between the strippers and the drag queens. Elena makes a startling discovery.

episodes.name: PEONY (symb. shame)
episodes.overview: To get what she ultimately wants, Lucía holds something over Julián's head. Paulina visits Dr. Cohen to ask an important question.

episodes.name: BROMELIA (symb. resilience)
episodes.overview: Ernesto gives Virginia a stirring pep talk about motherhood and revenge. Julián grapples with the consequences of his newfound fame.

episodes.name: TULIP (symb. hope)
episodes.overview: A rival florist family makes the de la Moras a generous offer. Elena finds a way to keep Carmela quiet. Paulina confronts her mother about Dr. Cohen.

episodes.name: TUSSILAGO (symb. worries)
episodes.overview: Virginia's side business gets her in trouble with a competitor, and when Bruno and Micaela go missing shortly afterward, their family fears the worst.

episodes.name: ORCHID (symb. lust)
episodes.overview: Dominique surprises Elena in more ways than one. María José tells Bruno about her Madrid plans. Diego finds an item that makes him mistrust Julián.

episodes.name: SISYMBRIUM (symb. adversity)
episodes.overview: After her plan to get Ernesto out of prison hits a snag, Paulina sees Dr. Cohen about her need to fix everyone's problems. A betrayal stuns the family.

episodes.name: POPPY (symb. resurrection)
episodes.overview: The family finally celebrates the flower shop's 50th anniversary. At the event, Virginia publicly announces who will inherit the business.

episodes.name: ROSE, (Symb unity)
episodes.overview: Missing her mother and seeking vengeance against Diego, Paulina returns to Mexico. Julián reunites with an old flame, who reveals a secret.

episodes.name: IRIS, (Symb. faith)
episodes.overview: Paulina is determined to buy back the family's former flower shop and cabaret, but obstacles arise. Diego makes a peace offering. Elena comes clean.

episodes.name: LOTUS, (Symb. mystery)
episodes.overview: Elena wants to keep her new job a secret. Paulina asks the former drag performers to return to the cabaret. Ernesto meets the Flock's founder, Jenny.

episodes.name: ALMOND, (Symb. awaken)
episodes.overview: After returning from Spain, María José takes issue with Paulina, while Bruno accompanies Micaela to her talent show audition. Julián makes a decision.

episodes.name: ACACIA, (Symb. secret love)
episodes.overview: Elena, Paulina and Julián attempt to track down the mystery man in Virginia's photos. Ernesto convinces Cacas to join the Flock.

episodes.name: CLOVES, (Symb, capricious)
episodes.overview: Jenny and the Flock start taking over the de la Mora mansion. Paulina confides in Alejo and plots revenge against Diego. Elena realizes she's in love.

episodes.name: GERANIUM, (Symb. counsel)
episodes.overview: Diego confronts Lucía about a secret she's been keeping from Julián. Ernesto's jealousy takes hold. On a night out with Alejo, Paulina feels tempted.

episodes.name: HELICONIA, (Symb. fertility)
episodes.overview: Diego asks Elena for a very personal favor for him and Julián. Paulina gets closer to Alejo. Eliminations continue on "Mexico's Most Talented."

episodes.name: PANSY, (Symb. reflexion)
episodes.overview: Virginia's will is finally read, and when the truth comes out, Paulina makes a drastic decision in an attempt to repent for her actions.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The de la Mora family grieves a loss while trying to recover sold businesses, plotting revenge and entangling themselves in romantic disasters.

episodes.name: PETUNIA (Symb. cunning)
episodes.overview: In the present, Paulina is surprised by her new cellmate. Shocking news is revealed about Elena. In 1979, rebellious Virginia celebrates her birthday.

episodes.name: SUNFLOWER (Symb. power)
episodes.overview: Purificación complicates life for Paulina. Diego and Julián reach out to Elena's exes. Back in 1979, Virginia tries new experiences.

episodes.name: GERBERA (Symb. first love)
episodes.overview: Victoria sends Virginia to a strict all-girls school. Diego attempts to reconcile with his homophobic parents, who offer him a suggestion.

episodes.name: MALLOW (Symb. ambition)
episodes.overview: María José suspects Purificación is hiding something. Paulina forges new alliances in prison. Ernesto lets the performers manage the cabaret.

episodes.name: AZALEA (Symb. temperance)
episodes.overview: In 1979, Virginia receives life-changing news as her father continues to get sicker. Paulina is freed from jail with María José's help.

episodes.name: BETONY (Symb. surprise)
episodes.overview: Victoria's meddling creates a conflict between the de la Mora siblings. A worried María José attempts to convince Purificación to seek mental help.

episodes.name: CLOVER (Symb. revenge)
episodes.overview: Julián finds out more about what happened between Elena and Diego. In 1979, Virginia plans to break the news to Salo and decide on their future.

episodes.name: COHOSH (Symb. scandal)
episodes.overview: Virginia is convinced her father has abandoned them, while Pato begins to suspect the truth. In the present, Pablo helps Elena escape.

episodes.name: HYACINTH (Symb. jealousy)
episodes.overview: Paulina looks into her family's past and starts asking questions about Pato. Julián and Elena team up to try and free Diego. Delia seeks revenge.

episodes.name: ELFDOCK (Symb. tears)
episodes.overview: Virginia comes up with a plan for her and Ernesto. Now, La Chiva reveals the truth to Paulina. Conflict increases between Delia and Victoria.

episodes.name: LAUREL (Symb. glory)
episodes.overview: The members of the de la Mora family each celebrate their new beginning while, in the shadows, Purificación plots her revenge.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The struggling de la Mora family faces new challenges with a new matriarch, while flashbacks reveal secrets about Virginia's youthful antics.
